metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Blushing Mermaid - NOTE Please rename to Flaerian.After Foundry destroyed, civilians come to deactivated SW.One of civilians dialogs
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-159.871567;25.131435;-84.656570&camTarget=-160.507172;24.460075;-85.037743ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for npc to appear and talk to this particular npc.

0.speaker: Flaerian
0.text: What I want to know is, who's going to clean up that pile of Watcher junk? Not me.

1.speaker: Flaerian
1.text: I mean no disrespect, but I really think these Flaming Fists are out of line.
